title: Authorization for Extra-Orbital Expansion
summary: Authorization granted to CORELAI SECTOR to initiate its first interstellar deployment toward system TE-110D (SORAN).
body:
Following thorough evaluation of submitted protocols, logistical capabilities, and ethical-strategic alignment, the United Earth Governance (UEG) hereby grants CORELAI SECTOR the status of:

"Interstellar Multi-Domain Operator – Level 1"

Authorization includes launch of the first autonomous Corelai unit beyond Earth's orbit, for exploration, terraforming, and settlement purposes.

Designated destination: TE-110 system, planet code TE-110D – 'SORAN'.

The launch window is now open.

Control to Corelai.

— UEG High Orbital Commission, Geneva Node
